A Bit About Me

I’m a 3rd-year Engineering student specializing in Information Science, with strong skills in Java, C, C++, and full-stack development. I have a passion for competitive programming and solving challenges using Data Structures and Algorithms. 💻✨

Creativity drives me, and I enjoy generating innovative ideas for technical projects and collaborations. Public speaking is another strength of mine, allowing me to confidently share knowledge and connect with diverse audiences. 🎤💡

In addition to my technical pursuits, I am a vocalist who finds inspiration in music. Singing fuels my creativity and helps me maintain balance, which I channel into my projects. 🎶🎙️

I’m always eager to learn, collaborate, and create impactful solutions. Let’s connect and work on something extraordinary together! 🤝🚀

Projects Working On
